p: Lung homogenate supernatants were used for assay of IL-6 and TNF- α using Mouse IL-6 and TNF- α ELISA kit following the protocol provided by the manufacturer. Values are expressed as pg/mL. Myeloperoxidase (MPO) activity was evaluated as an indicator for leukocyte infiltration and adhesion in many tissues, including the lung. Estimation of MPO activity was carried out according to the manufacturer protocol, and its values are expressed as pg/g tissue.
